feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 06:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: SSW 28 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
